display.title: Uranium Refinement
description: &&aUranium&&r has very few uses in &&2GTCEu&&r right now, as we're &&4yet to&&r implement our &&3Nuclear Reactor&&r (it's planned!).
Make &&dUranium Hexafluoride&&r from &&aUraninite&&r. This will allow you to seperate the isotopes between U-238 and U-235.
&&9Fluorine&&r is fully recycled in the reaction, but you will need around maybe 40 buckets to bootstrap.

&&9Hydrogen&&r is consumed, so you will need quite a lot of it. Either electrolyze a lot of water using several &&3LV Electrolyzers&&r for the best energy efficiency, or recycle any unused &&dhydrocarbons&&r such as Methane.
&&9Tip:&&r You can make this setup compact by having one single &&3Centrifuge&&r and using a &&6Fluid Regulator&&r set to &&dSupply Exact 1,000&&r.

subtitle.text: Let's hope this quest doesn't put you on a list
